steps: Place canned tomatoes and all spices (turmeric, cayenne, paprika, salt, garam masala, cumin) in Instant Pot and mix well
Add garlic and ginger to the sauce mixture
Place chicken on top of sauce (do not stir in)
Close Instant Pot lid and cook on high pressure for 10 minutes
Allow natural pressure release for 10 minutes, then release remaining pressure manually
Remove chicken from pot and set aside
Use immersion blender to blend sauce until smooth
Let sauce cool slightly (important to prevent separation)
Add butter, heavy cream, garam masala, and cilantro to sauce and stir
Remove half the sauce for freezing or storage (optional but recommended)
Return chicken to pot with remaining sauce and heat through
Serve over basmati rice or zucchini noodles
title: Butter Chicken
